name: Zeltoas
description:
Submission for The Indie Tales Jam, made in couple of days.

"If you cannot leave your room, just add some legs..."

A strategy/management game where you have to manage the subsystems inside the room to maintain a balance while destroying things outside the room with your beam. 

You will most likely die very quickly in the first few runs.

(some of the looping sounds don't play nice with the browser, sorry about that)
